title: Create LAP TIME-achieved-on-track-layout Relationship
description:
* The relationship ›achieved-on-track-layout‹ is created when the provided IDs of the LAP TIME and TRACK LAYOUT are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›achieved-on-track-layout‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* At the same time a LAP TIME can only be in a ›achieved-on-track-layout‹ relationship with one TRACK LAYOUT
